name: Therian's Runaway
description:
This little human being is running away from a laboratory. He realised he can become into a Monster when he picks up the little green particles.

When you are a Monster, you can:

Dash, Double Jump,  Attack and being luminescent in the dark!

CONTROLS:

<- -> Run right and left.

SPACE- Jump

A - Attack

D - Dash

S - You can become into a Monster (if you have 30 green particles)

F- Luminiscent
